name: radioactivity_concentration_of_84Br_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Br" means the element "bromine" and "84Br" is the isotope "bromine-84" with a half-life of 2.21e-02 days.
